title: Update regarding LuxeBrands
story_body:
2023-02-08 08:00:00 EST

LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) reported its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2022.

For the fourth quarter, LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) announced revenue of $542.1 million, representing a 21.5% increase from $446.3 million in the same period last year. Net sales for the quarter rose 22.1% to $528.5 million, compared to $433.1 million in the prior-year quarter.

For the full year, LuxeBrands, Inc. (LUXE) reported revenue of $1.93 billion, up 18.2% from $1.63 billion in 2021. Net sales for the year increased 19.1% to $1.87 billion, compared to $1.57 billion in the prior year.

The company attributed the revenue growth to strong demand across its product lines, as well as successful expansion into new markets. 

2023-02-08 08:00:00 EST
